languages.text: "Верно. Это... мое личное испытание, Вольный Торговец. И так заповедано в житии святой Ардженты — паломники входят под своды корабля по одному. Ибо деяния их должны быть оценены, и каждый будет допущен — или не допущен — к святыне, согласно делам его и вере его".

traits.locale_text: "Верно. Это... мое личное испытание, Вольный Торговец. И так заповедано в житии святой Ардженты — паломники входят под своды корабля по-одному. Ибо деяния их должны быть оценены, и каждый будет допущен — или не допущен — к святыне, согласно делам его и вере его".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I do. This... This is my personal trial, Rogue Trader. Besides, so it is written in the life of Saint Argenta that pilgrims may enter the ship one by one, for their deeds must first be measured. Every pilgrim will thence be permitted to behold the relic or denied that right according to their past actions and the strength of their faith."
languages.original_text: "Верно. Это... мое личное испытание, Вольный Торговец. И так заповедано в житии святой Ардженты — паломники входят под своды корабля по одному. Ибо деяния их должны быть оценены, и каждый будет допущен — или не допущен — к святыне, согласно делам его и вере его".

languages.text: 「そうだ。これは…これは我の個人的な試練なのです、自由開拓者。それに、こう書かれています。聖アルジェンタの人生には巡礼者が一人また一人と船にやってくる。というのも彼らの行いを最初に測るために。全ての巡礼者は過去の行いや信念の強さによって、聖遺物を見守ることを許され、またその権利を否定される」
languages.original_text: "I do. This... This is my personal trial, Rogue Trader. Besides, so it is written in the life of Saint Argenta that pilgrims may enter the ship one by one, for their deeds must first be measured. Every pilgrim will thence be permitted to behold the relic or denied that right according to their past actions and the strength of their faith."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ。これは…これは我の個人的な試練なのです、自由開拓者。それに、こう書かれています。聖アルジェンタの人生には巡礼者が一人また一人と船にやってくる。というのも彼らの行いを最初に測るために。全ての巡礼者は過去の行いや信念の強さによって、聖遺物を見守ることを許され、またその権利を否定される」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我确实是这么打算的。这……这是属于我个人的试炼，行商浪人。此外，圣阿洁塔的传记中也是这么记载的：所有朝圣者都需要分别上船，因为在进入圣船之前，他们的行为必须先进行衡量，评判他们的信仰与过去的所作所为。只有通过试炼的朝圣者，才有权瞻仰圣物。”
languages.original_text: "I do. This... This is my personal trial, Rogue Trader. Besides, so it is written in the life of Saint Argenta that pilgrims may enter the ship one by one, for their deeds must first be measured. Every pilgrim will thence be permitted to behold the relic or denied that right according to their past actions and the strength of their faith."

traits.locale_text: “我确实是这么打算的。这……这是属于我个人的试炼，行商浪人。此外，圣阿洁塔的传记中也是这么记载的：所有朝圣者都需要分别上船，因为在进入圣船之前，他们的行为必须先进行衡量，评判他们的信仰与过去的所作所为。只有通过试炼的朝圣者，才有权瞻仰圣物。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « En effet, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. L'épreuve qui m'attend n'appartient qu'à moi. De plus, il est écrit dans la vie de Sainte Argenta que les pèlerins ne peuvent entrer qu'un par un dans le vaisseau, car leurs faits et gestes doivent d'abord être jugés. Alors seulement, ils auront le droit ou non de contempler la relique, en vertu de leurs agissements passés et de la force de leurs convictions. »
languages.original_text: "I do. This... This is my personal trial, Rogue Trader. Besides, so it is written in the life of Saint Argenta that pilgrims may enter the ship one by one, for their deeds must first be measured. Every pilgrim will thence be permitted to behold the relic or denied that right according to their past actions and the strength of their faith."

traits.locale_text: « En effet, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. L'épreuve qui m'attend n'appartient qu'à moi. De plus, il est écrit dans la vie de Sainte Argenta que les pèlerins ne peuvent entrer qu'un par un dans le vaisseau, car leurs faits et gestes doivent d'abord être jugés. Alors seulement, ils auront le droit ou non de contempler la relique, en vertu de leurs agissements passés et de la force de leurs convictions. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Así es. Esta... es mi prueba personal, Comerciante Independiente. Además, en la hagiografía de santa Argenta está escrito que los peregrinos deben entrar en la nave de uno en uno, pues sus acciones deben medirse en primer lugar. Desde allí, a cada peregrino le será permitido o denegado el derecho a contemplar la reliquia en función de sus acciones pasadas y de la intensidad de su fe».
languages.original_text: "I do. This... This is my personal trial, Rogue Trader. Besides, so it is written in the life of Saint Argenta that pilgrims may enter the ship one by one, for their deeds must first be measured. Every pilgrim will thence be permitted to behold the relic or denied that right according to their past actions and the strength of their faith."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Esta... es mi prueba personal, Comerciante Independiente. Además, en la hagiografía de santa Argenta está escrito que los peregrinos deben entrar en la nave de uno en uno, pues sus acciones deben medirse en primer lugar. Desde allí, a cada peregrino le será permitido o denegado el derecho a contemplar la reliquia en función de sus acciones pasadas y de la intensidad de su fe».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ja. Das ... das ist meine ureigene Prüfung, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Außerdem steht über das Leben der Hl. Argenta geschrieben, dass Pilger das Schiff nur einzeln betreten dürfen, weil zunächst ihre Taten bewertet werden müssen. Jeder Pilger erhält dann die Erlaubnis, das Relikt zu sehen, oder sie wird ihm verweigert, je nachdem, wie er sich in der Vergangenheit verhalten hat und wie stark sein Glaube war."
languages.original_text: "I do. This... This is my personal trial, Rogue Trader. Besides, so it is written in the life of Saint Argenta that pilgrims may enter the ship one by one, for their deeds must first be measured. Every pilgrim will thence be permitted to behold the relic or denied that right according to their past actions and the strength of their faith."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Das ... das ist meine ureigene Prüfung, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Außerdem steht über das Leben der Hl. Argenta geschrieben, dass Pilger das Schiff nur einzeln betreten dürfen, weil zunächst ihre Taten bewertet werden müssen. Jeder Pilger erhält dann die Erlaubnis, das Relikt zu sehen, oder sie wird ihm verweigert, je nachdem, wie er sich in der Vergangenheit verhalten hat und wie stark sein Glaube war."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Öyle. Bu benim kişisel imtihanım Hür Tacir. Ayrıca... Azize Argenta'nın hayat hikâyesinde, hacıların gemiye teker teker girmesi öğütlenir. Böylelikle her hacının davranışları tartılacaktır. Hacıların her biri, geçmişteki eylemleri ve inancının kuvveti doğrultusunda ya yadigârı görmeye hak kazanacak ya da bu haktan mahrum kalacaktır."
languages.original_text: "I do. This... This is my personal trial, Rogue Trader. Besides, so it is written in the life of Saint Argenta that pilgrims may enter the ship one by one, for their deeds must first be measured. Every pilgrim will thence be permitted to behold the relic or denied that right according to their past actions and the strength of their faith."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü planım bu. Bu, benim kişisel imtihanım Hür Tacir. Ayrıca... Azize Argenta'nın hayat hikâyesinde, hacıların teker teker girmesi gerektiği söylenir. Çünkü her hacının davranışları tartılacaktır. Hacıların her biri, geçmişteki eylemleri ve inancının kuvveti doğrultusunda ya yadigârı görmeye hak kazanacak ya da bu haktan mahrum bırakılacaktır."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
